alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 10 at 3:05AM CDT until June 10 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of the Panhandle of Texas, including the following counties, Gray and Wheeler. * WHEN...Until 700 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 305 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Shamrock, Wheeler, Mclean, Lefors, Kellerville, Lela, New Mobeetie, Twitty, Alanreed, Lake Mcclellan and Mobeetie. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
